Summary Heading: A nice comfort with my lovey while on a budget
Summary: If your looking to stay somewhere that you’ll be left alone and want no one to bug you I prefer and recommend the harbor bay off harbor Blvd in Costa Mesa. My girlfriend and I truly believe this hidden gem in the heart of Costa Mesa does not deserve as bad of a reputation it receives. The owner is such a sweet person and the employees here all work hard to ensure guest are safe and have a comfortable stay. You can tell they really care about this place. We recommend this place for anyone just getting to know Costa Mesa and trying to save some money. It’s worth it.
